name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Senshitachi no Kiseki
name_original: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Senshitachi no Kiseki
description: Kidō Senshi Gundamu: Senshitachi no Kiseki (機動戦士ガンダム　戦士達の軌跡, "Mobile Suit Gundam: Warrior's Locus") is a GameCube-exclusive third-person shooter video game released in 2004 by Bandai. The game was released only in Japan and a part of the Mobile Suit Gundam series.
